column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I am so glad that this isn't in Austin
column2: Texas!! This is -hands down- THE BEST PIZZA ON THE PLANET!! The deep dish crust is an experience all it's own
column3: not to be compared by any other pizza place that I've had. They are very generous with the toppings and if you get sausage... well
column4: that's a LAYER of the pizza and you get it in every bite. Then there's that Malnati salad! I know what you're thinking... "salad?!?" Trust me. Get the salad. My teenagers ate as much salad as pizza. It's that good. This is your pizza stop. You'll thank me after the first bite. You're welcome.
